resource_data:
"<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/76430</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>76430</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>21ef4441-4cc0-4ecc-ab64-584009375c21#1#7</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A molekuláris genetika eredményei</string>
            <string language="en">Results of molecular genetics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Resultate der molekularen Genetik</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résultats de la génétique moléculaire</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resultados de genetics molecular</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risultati della genetica molecolare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αποτελέσματα της μοριακής γενετικής</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resultados de genéticas moleculares</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A molekuláris genetikai kutatások rövid bemutatása - géntechnológia, idegen gének bevitele magasabb rendű élőlényekbe, klónozás</string>
            <string language="en">Short presentation of molecular genetical researches - gene technology, intake of genes not belonging into superior living beings, cloning</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">genetika,  molekuláris biológia,  géntechnológia,  </string>
            <string language="en">genetics, molecular biology, gene technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kurze Darstellung von molekularem genetischem 
erforscht - Gentechnologie, Einlaß der Gene, die nicht in überlegene
lebende Wesen, Klonen gehören</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La présentation courte de génétique 
moléculaire recherche - la technologie de gène, prise des gènes 
n'appartenant pas dans les êtres vivants supérieurs, clonage</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A apresentação curta de genetical molecular 
pesquisa - a tecnologia do gene, entrada dos genes que não pertencem 
em seres vivos superiores, cloning</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La presentazione corta di genetico molecolare 
ricerca - la tecnologia del gene, presa dei geni che non appartengono 
negli esseri viventi superiori, clonazione</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύντομη παρουσίαση των μοριακών γενετικών ερευνών - 
τεχνολογία γονιδίων, εισαγωγή των γονιδίων που δεν ανήκουν στα 
ανώτερα ζωντανά οντα, κλωνοποίηση</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La presentación corta de genético molecular 
investiga - la tecnología del gene, producto de los genes que no 
pertenecen en los seres vivos superiores, reproducción</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Genetik, molekulare Biologie, Gentechnologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la génétique, biologie moléculaire, technologie de 
gène</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">genetics, biologia molecular, tecnologia do gene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la genetica, biologia molecolare, tecnologia del gene</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γενετική, η μοριακή βιολογία, τεχνολογία γονιδίων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">genética, biología molecular, tecnología del gene</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <typicalAgeRange>
            <string language="x-T-LRE">16-18</string>
          </typicalAgeRange>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>presentation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:BCSS Kft.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>144</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>76430</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=21ef4441-4cc0-4ecc-ab64-584009375c21&v=1&b=7</uri>

  </manifestation>
